name: Mushroom
description:
Controlls Movement WASD Look Arrow keys Exit game ESC Use E The story

Your wife sent you out to get some mushrooms for a mushroom stew. You go on find a mushroom. You taste it like a normal person would do right. You start getting nauseous. You get kicked out of consciousness and wake up in the middle of the night. You hear a scream......

inspirations

This game was inspired by multiple games and hobby's. The all known mushroom picking which our country (czechia) is known for. The music on the menu is inspired by hl alyx soundtracks.

I hope i will get into someones 3 scary games.
